4Suite™ API Documentation

► Module Ft.Xml.Xslt.Roman

Light-weight functions to convert from Roman-Numerals to ints, and vice-versa.
Functions:
IToRoman
Globals:
factor_list, roman_equiv

Functions

IToRoman(num)

Globals

factor_list = [1000, 500, 100, 50, 10, 5, 1]
roman_equiv = {1: 'I', 5: 'V', 10: 'X', 50: 'L', 100: 'C', 500: 'D', 1000: 'M'}
